title: Katie Price divides fans as five-year-old daughter wears heeled boots
text:
Katie’s fans are not happy (Picture: Rex/Instagram)

Katie Price has come under fire after she dressed her youngest daughter, five-year-old Bunny, in stiletto boots as they attended an event.

The mum-of-five was at an event for the Autism’s Got Talent show on 18 October to support her oldest son, 17-year-old Harvey, who is taking part in the competition, and made sure to bring her other children along with her.

She took to Instagram to post a picture of her alongside Harvey, Bunny, 12-year-old daughter Princess, and six-year-old son Jett, in which Bunny can be seen wearing what appears to be pink boots with a stiletto heel.

‘Can’t wait to spend half term with all my kiddies,’ Katie said. ‘What has everyone got planned for half term?’

However, a lot of fans were not happy with Bunny’s choice of shoes, and took to the comments to express their thoughts.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘What has Bunny got on her feet??’ one fan questioned.

‘Why has Bunny got high heels on?’ another commented.

‘Is Bunny wearing stiletto boots?’ another wrote.

Katie posted this picture of her and her children at the Autism’s Got Talent event, where Bunny can be seen wearing boots with a stiletto heel (Picture: Instagram)

‘Is Bunny wearing high boots for any reason?’ another concerned fan posted.

Katie has yet to respond to any comments publicly, although some fans were quick to jump to her defense.

‘Yes Bunny has obviously put Katie’s boots on!’ one fan said. ‘What little girl doesn’t put her mummy’s high heels on once in a while?’

‘She’s child who clearly loves fashion, let her be herself. It’s not like she’s going to be wearing them 24/7,’ another fan said in response to the critical comments from others.

It comes after Katie previously showed off her £2million Sussex home to her followers, after it was previously hailed a ‘mucky mansion’ by some.

Posting a video to her YouTube channel, the former glamour model showed off different rooms of the home, all piled high with clothes, as she revealed she was attempting to clear the house out.

Katie later claimed that she was not actually living in the mansion and ‘something had gone wrong’ while she attempted to clear it out.

‘My house… Everyone is calling it “mucky mansion,”’ she said.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Yes, because I’m not living in my house. It’s empty. I’m doing stuff to it and something has gone wrong.

‘I’ll explain that in due course. I have builders inside my house, my post gets moved here, there and everywhere.’

description: Fans of Katie Price are not happy after the star allowed her five-year-old daughter Bunny to wear stiletto boots to an event.
